```{r}
install.packages("foreign")

```

```{r}
library(foreign)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidyr)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
equip_au <- read.dbf(file = "bpe1217_dbase/bpe1217_nbequip_au.dbf")
equip_bv <- read.dbf(file = "bpe1217_dbase/bpe1217_nbequip_bv.dbf")
equip_dep <- read.dbf(file = "bpe1217_dbase/bpe1217_nbequip_dep.dbf")
equip_reg <- read.dbf(file = "bpe1217_dbase/bpe1217_nbequip_reg.dbf")
equip_uu <- read.dbf(file = "bpe1217_dbase/bpe1217_nbequip_uu.dbf")
equip_com <- read.dbf(file = "bpe1217_dbase/bpe1217_pres_equip_com.dbf")
```

```{r}
equip_com %>% distinct(au2010) #790 aires urbaines
equip_com %>% distinct(depcom) #35000 communes
equip_com %>% distinct(uu2010) #2300 unites urbaines
equip_com %>% distinct(bv2012) #1600 bassins de vie
#equipcom indique la presence ou non d'un equipement, par aire urbaine/commune/unite urbaine/bassin de vie

```
